thread.title: Plateno opens first of five resort hotels in Maldives
thread.title_full: Plateno opens first of five resort hotels in Maldives

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Plateno opens first of five resort hotels in Maldives
text:
Plateno opens first of five resort hotels in Maldives   
Sep 03, 2015 eTN   
JAKARTA, Indonesia – Plateno Hotels Group made its first step into the Maldives by rebranding Plumeria Boutique GuestHouse into the 7 Days Premium Plumeria Resort Maldives starting on August 24th 2015 with a 100 room development. 
7 Days Premium Plumeria Resort Maldives is designed to provide a comfortable holiday guestrooms, each offering comfort and sea views. The Super Deluxe Rooms feature a queen size bed and private balcony. The Hotel’s amenities include a swiming pool, an international restaurant , a sky bar and a water sports center. 
Located at, Vaavu Atoll – Thinadhoo, the location with its iconic sandy beach is nationally famous for its abundant marine life and beautiful coral reef perfect for its fishing, snorkelling and scuba diving making 7 Days Premium Plumeria Resort Maldives the ideal choice for fun and adventure. 
Plateno has already established an enviable reputation in the China Market. The current evolution of the Group is to expand throughout Asia including the Maldives, where it has already five resorts under development from midscale to luxury , as one of the prime holiday locations in Asia. 
As part of the rebranding, the hotel will undergo improvements to both the product and services to meet the exacting global 7 Days Premium standards.
